lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Wednesday about Mike Richter, the retired Rangers goalie, who received the Lester Patrick Award for outstanding service to hockey in the United States, misidentified the Congressional district that includes Guilford, Conn., where Richter lives. It is the Third Congressional District, not the Fourth. (In 2007 Richter decided against a run for Congress in the Fourth Congressional District.).
